pullrequest.title: Added icons and hooked up file menu actions

content.raw: I'd also like to change the tick/untick boxes to be a single button with a drop-down menu next to it, with select all/none options, like in gmail, but that can wait for another time, as it needs a bit more thought (here "ticked" is different to "selected", so it's not going to have exactly the same functionality as in gmail)
content.html: I'd also like to change the tick/untick boxes to be a single button with a drop-down menu next to it, with select all/none options, like in gmail, but that can wait for another time, as it needs a bit more thought (here "ticked" is different to "selected", so it's not going to have exactly the same functionality as in gmail)
